column.name: id
column.comment: The unique identifier for this gr4vy buyer.

column.name: gr4vy_id
column.comment: The unique Gr4vy ID account

column.name: external_identifier
column.comment: An external identifier that can be used to match the buyer against your own records - for Magento 2, it customer entity_id.

column.name: buyer_id
column.comment: The unique Gr4vy ID for this buyer.

column.name: display_name
column.comment: A unique name for this buyer which is used in the Gr4vy admin panel to give a buyer a human readable name.

column.name: billing_address
column.comment: billing address detail in JSON format

column.name: created_at
column.comment: The date and time when this buyer was created in system.

column.name: updated_at
column.comment: The date and time when this buyer was last updated in system.

column.comment: The unique identifier for this transaction.

column.comment: The payment method used for this transaction.

column.comment: The buyer used for this transaction.

column.name: service_id
column.comment: The payment service used for this transaction.

column.name: status
column.comment: The status of the transaction being processed.

column.name: amount
column.comment: The authorized amount for this transaction.

column.name: captured_amount
column.comment: The captured amount for this transaction.

column.name: refunded_amount
column.comment: The refunded amount for this transaction.

column.name: currency
column.comment: The currency code for this transaction.

column.name: created_at
column.comment: The date and time when this transaction was created in system.

column.name: updated_at
column.comment: Defines when the transaction was last updated.

column.name: external_identifier
column.comment: An external identifier that can be used to match the transaction against your own records.

column.name: environment

column.name: id
column.comment: The unique ID of the payment method.

column.name: method_id
column.comment: Gr4vy Method Id

column.name: status
column.comment: The state of the payment method.

column.name: method
column.comment: The type of this payment method.

column.name: label
column.comment: A label for the card or the account.

column.name: scheme
column.comment: The scheme of the card. Only applies to card payments.

column.name: created_at
column.comment: The date and time when this payment method was first created in system.

column.name: updated_at
column.comment: The date and time when this payment method was last updated in system.

column.name: external_identifier
column.comment: An external identifier that can be used to match the payment method against your own records.

column.name: expiration_date
column.comment: The expiration date for the payment method.

column.name: approval_url
column.comment: The optional URL that the buyer needs to be redirected to to further authorize their payment

column.name: environment
column.comment: The environment this payment method has been stored for. This will be null of the payment method was not stored.

column.name: id
column.comment: The ID of this payment service.

column.name: service_id
column.comment: Gr4vy Service Id

column.name: payment_service_definition_id
column.comment: The ID of the payment service definition used to create this service.

column.name: method
column.comment: Defines the ID of the payment method that this service handles.

column.name: display_name
column.comment: The custom name set for this service.

column.name: status
column.comment: The current status of this service. This will start off as pending, move to created, and might eventually move to an error status if and when the credentials are no longer valid.

column.name: accepted_currencies
column.comment: A list of currencies for which this service is enabled, in ISO 4217 three-letter code format.

column.name: accepted_countries
column.comment: A list of countries for which this service is enabled, in ISO two-letter code format.

column.name: created_at
column.comment: The date and time when this service was created.

column.name: updated_at
column.comment: The date and time when this service was last updated.

column.name: active
column.comment: Defines if this service is currently active or not

column.name: position
column.comment: Defines if this service is currently active or not

column.name: environment
column.comment: Determines the Gr4vy environments in which this service should be available.
